dataset.title: Snow depth data for saddle grid, 1982 - 1990.

section.title: Some of these data were published in a data report:
section.para: Halfpenny, J.C., and O. Pollak. 1983. Snow survey data from the Saddle, Niwot Ridge, Colorado, 1982-1983. University of Colorado Long-Term Ecological Research Data Report 83/9. 53 pp.

The depth of snow was measured at 88 points on the Saddle grid. Depths were measured from fixed extendable poles on the western or accumulation portion of the 350 x 500 m grid, while depths were measured by probing on the eastern portion. Measurements during winter months varied from every 2 weeks to about monthly depending on weather conditions. Measurements during the summer were approximately weekly until all snow disappeared or snow accumulation began for the next winter. Meltout date can be determined from the last date snow was present at a grid point. The area of the study was 19.7 ha.

section.title: Methods:
section.para: A thorough description of the methodology used to obtain these data is contained in Halfpenny and Pollack (1983). The data were provided by Jim Halfpenny in July 1993 as ASCII files (*.prn) that had been saved from 1-2-3 spreadsheet files. These files are archived in /data1/Datman/Halfcent/Sadsnow/Archive. The format of these files differs from that presented in the data section below. Scripts were written to generate a format more consistent with the file containing later snow surveys (http://niwot.colorado.edu/data_csvs/saddsnow.dw.data.csv).
No changes were made to actual snow depth values.

The initial iteration of this file contained only data for 1982 to 1986. Data for 1987 and 1988 had not been provided by JH and the data for 1989 to 1991 were not sufficiently reduced for inclusion. Notes included in the files that were the sources of the data were:
snodep82.prn ("Snow survey at Saddle, Spring and Summer 1982 (compiled by LB and NA 12/88 from DR-83/9)");
snodep83.prn ("Snow survey at Saddle, Winter 1982-83, Spring and Summer 1983 (compiled by LB 12/88 from DR-83/9)");

snodep84.prn ("Snow survey at Saddle, Winter 1983-84, Spring and Summer 1984 (compiled by NA 12/88 from summary snow survey sheet) **(data on 6/1 differs from survey table, data on 6/11 had numerous "239" values which I left as blank)");

snodep85.prn ("Snow survey at Saddle, Winter 1984-85, Spring and Summer 1985 compiled 01/06/89 from snow survey tables of Taylor zeroes and no data points are as appear on tables. Some data differ from raw data e.g. 05/31 #s 54, 55, 56");
snodep86.prn ("Snow survey at Saddle, Winter 1985-86, Summer 1986 (compiled 12/88 by NA and LB from raw data (1st three) and Spencer's data sheets) No surveys 1/86 - 5/86 due to buried poles");
snodep89.prn (Snow survey at Saddle, Winter 1988-89, Summer 1989); snodep90.prn (Snow Survey at Saddle, Spring 1990).
